document.title: Release notes for EiffelStudio 5.6 related to the debugger

list.item: More flexibility has been added for the layout in the debugging tool. One can merge the Current objects with the locals and arguments.
New thread tool that let you switch from one thread to another while debugging.
New breakpoint tool to see at glance the status of all your breakpoints.
Added ability to see the routine that defines an agent object.
One can ignore certain kind of exceptions.
